overview: Henri Cartier-Bresson: The Decisive Moment is an 18-minute film produced in 1973 by Scholastic Magazines, Inc. and the International Center of Photography. It features a selection of Cartier-Bressonâ€™s iconic photographs, along with rare commentary by the photographer himself.
tagline: There is nothing in this world that does not have a decisive moment
title: The Decisive Moment
